name: AVCaptionGroup
desc: An object that represents zero or more captions that intersect in time.

items.name: init(timeRange: CMTimeRange)
items.desc: Creates a caption group with a time range.

items.name: init(captions: [AVCaption], timeRange: CMTimeRange)
items.desc: Creates a caption group with captions and a time range.

items.name: var captions: [AVCaption]
items.desc: The captions associated with the caption group.

items.name: var timeRange: CMTimeRange
items.desc: The time range of the caption group.
